name: Into the Abyss (itch) (oeschmid)
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 48. The theme was 'Deeper and deeper', so in this game you play as a diver, in search for a lost artifact within the bowels of the Temple of the Sea Floor.

I wrote 10 levels up in Puzzlescript. There are some things I am more proud of, and some things that I am less proud of - I may take another look at this some time and refine it: specifically, improve some of the levels, give it more polish, and give another go at some of the pixel art.

Hope you enjoy!

Other notes:

I used the following pallete for all my art: https://lospec.com/palette-list/seafoam

I also used the level select fork of Puzzlescript here: https://pancelor.com/PuzzleScript/editor.html

I recommend Puzzlescript to anyone interested in making 2d turn-based puzzle games. It's very intuitive, surprisingly powerful, and has some decent documentation and source code to read through if you do some looking online.
